text:
*First National Realty Partners is hiring a Content Manager* :rocket:

To learn more, check out their listing on the job board: <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/158132-content-manager>

I just posted this. FNRP is legit, fun, fast-paced. Looking for a great content manager to join our ranks. We want to build a team out under you for QC. Loads of support. DM me with questions. FNRP is the best company I've worked with. Super fun, hard working, fast moving. Spending thousands/day on ads. A ton of organic traffic. Emails going out to thousands. Your content will get read and you'll be able to improve over time with data!
